title: Why you bully me
author: Why you bully me
content: I wanna know your favourite meme coins and why? That is all.             moooon!!!

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Why you bully me on May 10, 2023, 12:28:50 PMI wanna know your favourite meme coins and why? That is all.             moon!!!    I am not predicting a possible moon for any meme coin at the moment, this is because the present market condition and other problems facing the blockchain fees systems may impede on meme coin possibility to make any significant increase. I use to monitor dogecoin for a while now but at the moment the coin condition is far from a possible bull market and that is because of the current cryptocurrency market condition. So investing in any meme coin can be of great risk to investors, and at that, I can't trust any of those coins.

comments.author: riskarcher
comments.body: Quote from: Why you bully me on May 10, 2023, 12:28:50 PMI wanna know your favourite meme coins and why? That is all.             moooon!!!    Doge is the best meme coin and is formed because of a solid community from year to year, at least the meme coin that still exists for the long term. My opinion is the same as other coin analysis, never invest your money in meme coin. If you want to join in meme coin invest only 10 -20$, never play fire for a long time because it will be very risky, set the startegy out.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Quote from: Why you bully me on May 10, 2023, 12:28:50 PMI wanna know your favourite meme coins and why? There is no favorite coin for memes but when you see an opportunity for meme coins then you can make good use of it because this will have a bigger profit the same thing when the meme coin that is being hype is PEPE but this coin has gone down because the hype is over.Remember favorite meme coins will have a high risk especially if you hold on longer it will be bad considering this shitcoin will always be discarded at the end.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Why you bully me on May 10, 2023, 12:28:50 PMI wanna know your favourite meme coins and why?I know it seems like it's hype for meme coins again, but I have absolutely no interest in buying or keeping them. Back to your question, what is your favorite meme coins and why?Dogecoin (DOGE) is my favorite meme coin (regardless of whether I have it or not), this coin is my favorite because Dogecoin (DOGE) is the godfather of all meme coins like Bitcoin (BTC) which is the godfather of crypto as a whole. That's all, nothing more.

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: Doge coinShiba inuPepe coinAIdogeWhy? It's caused by those coins were giving me bunch of money in short time. I must be so thankful to the guy who has been making a thread about pepe token after it was getting launched.Thishttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5449468.0He could like able to predict the future. lol I don't care so much about what how useless meme coin/token is as long as i can get profit and that's fine. Crypto = The way to make money. Even some people consider crypto as money generator.

comments.author: Raflesia
comments.body: Quote from: Why you bully me on May 10, 2023, 12:28:50 PMI wanna know your favourite meme coins and why? Nothing There is no meme that is really my favorite so far because apart from anything it's just a coin that only sweetens and is only done with some momentum when it's hype.I still believe that nobody really cares about that if there isn't a pump schematic there. most people who have been there until now are just waiting for something like that by continuing to watch and study the cycle and observe the moment they enter and pump after they are lucky everything goes.Not naive for a few years before I also did something like that even though now I don't. but on the other hand, what needs to be emphasized in my opinion is not based on likes but only on using the momentum to enrich oneself.

comments.author: cute nmp
comments.body: My favorite meme coins are Doge,Shibu and Pepe.Funny I missed the whole Pepe bullish move and don't think I will buy it since the price is already too high.Memes coins are just hype and are just a simple and quick way to get rich in Crypto don't think there are good for long term investment.

comments.author: milewilda
comments.body: Quote from: Why you bully me on May 10, 2023, 12:28:50 PMI wanna know your favourite meme coins and why? That is all.             moooon!!!    I have some meme coins that i've been holding for so long.DOGESHIBPEPE(NEW)TURBO(NEW)OGGY(NEW)If we do try to look up on those new coins they are currently making out some noise as of this moment.I would say that it did really bring out that huge profitson my investment specially i did able to get in on the right time but of course i had put up not that much so expect the profits arent that enourmous but having somemultiple folds on my investment wasnt really that so bad after all.SHIB had been removed on that innovation zone on binance but i do still have the positivity that they would be able to push up that Shibarium.As for DOGE then i wont be shocked that one day this would be the main payment option on Twitter. Lets just take up some time and waiton what would happen next.

comments.author: WalkerIVIV
comments.body: every meme coin that could flip my money and gives me massive profit is my favourite, but so far only shib that's my favourite, the newer meme coin i was too late in joining therefore didn't make any meaningful profit.

comments.author: Teraboy
comments.body: AIDOGE become the new favourite meme coins now because many of its holders are also getting massive airdrops from other meme coin which means you just multiply your investment by claiming the AIDOGE airdrops, it's continuous rewards, but overall i'd say any arb claimers are lucky people getting continuous airdrops until today and that includes some famous meme coin which got good liquidity and could only mean free money.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: WalkerIVIV on May 10, 2023, 10:12:50 PMevery meme coin that could flip my money and gives me massive profit is my favourite, but so far only shib that's my favourite, the newer meme coin i was too late in joining, therefore didn't make any meaningful profit.I still remember when Shiba was on the rise some yesrs ago, its fans thought the hype may never end, but then now that the price has dropped significantly compared to its all-time price, Shiba has been struggling for recovery since then, and this is the outcome with 99%/of the meme coins we have in the market today. Just as you have rightly said, it is better to take them as a pporousgamble and only for those that could flip our money real quick since we have taken them as speculative assets of high risks.

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: All of meme coins that will not be rugpulled by its developers aka scammers. There have been many cases which liquidity being pulled out by the scammers. This is only wasting our money. I really like meme token which was not scamming its traders. i.e shiba, doge and anyother meme token which can be identified as legit token for us,

comments.author: AakZaki
comments.body: memecoin is currently hype, but there aren't many memecoins that I like. I still hold SHIBA and DOGE and these two memecoins are memecoins that still survive and have not disappeared to this day. But the memecoin that just appeared at this time is just because the hype is so high. this will result in a high risk of losing money on memecoin as well. so be careful.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Quote from: Why you bully me on May 10, 2023, 12:28:50 PMI wanna know your favourite meme coins and why? That is all.             moooon!!!    I was able to make money with DOGE before, and that's why it was my favorite.Though with regards to the new meme tokens, I haven't found any good meme token yet since most of them are pumping because of hype and I'm always late getting those meme token. I'm hoping for more luck this year and hopefully to get meme tokens this time and make profit as well.

comments.author: wajik-tempe
comments.body: I don't really invest into memecoins but holding a few dollars worth of memecoins could make you thousands if it's the right one, eventhough the chance is one in a million.Dogecoin, Shiba Inu, and SafeMoon are some of the most well-known meme currencies and also my favourites due to it's success. These coins have grown in popularity because to their community-driven ethos and distinct branding, as well as celebrity sponsorships and social media influencer backing.
